descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource

options.name: Account
options.description: Represents an individual account, which is an organization or person involved with your business (such as customers, competitors, and partners)

options.name: Attachment
options.description: Represents a file that a has uploaded and attached to a parent object

options.name: Case
options.description: Represents a case, which is a customer issue or problem

options.name: Contact
options.description: Represents a contact, which is an individual associated with an account

options.name: Custom Object
options.description: Represents a custom object

options.name: Document
options.description: Represents a document

options.name: Flow
options.description: Represents an autolaunched flow

options.name: Lead
options.description: Represents a prospect or potential

options.name: Opportunity
options.description: Represents an opportunity, which is a sale or pending deal

options.name: Search
options.description: Search records

options.name: Task
options.description: Represents a business activity such as making a phone call or other to-do items. In the user interface, and records are collectively referred to as activities.

options.name: User
options.description: Represents a person, which is one user in system

resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many flows

options.name: Invoke
options.description: Invoke a flow

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

externalId.name: externalId
externalId.description: The field to check to see if the account already exists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
externalId.ai_hint: The field to check to see if the account already exists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

externalIdValue.name: externalIdValue
externalIdValue.description: If this value exists in the 'match against' field, update the account. Otherwise create a new one.
externalIdValue.ai_hint: If this value exists in the 'match against' field, update the account. Otherwise create a new one.

company.name: company
company.description: Company of the lead. If person account record types have been enabled, and if the value of Company is null, the lead converts to a person account.
company.ai_hint: Company of the lead. If person account record types have been enabled, and if the value of Company is null, the lead converts to a person account.

lastname.name: lastname
lastname.description: Required. Last name of the contact. Limited to 80 characters.
lastname.ai_hint: Required. Last name of the contact. Limited to 80 characters.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: description
options.description: Text description of the Document. Limit: 255 characters.

options.name: isPrivate
options.description: Whether this record is viewable only by the owner and administrators (true) or viewable by all otherwise-allowed users (false)

options.name: owner
options.description: ID of the User who owns the attachment. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

leadId.name: leadId
leadId.description: ID of lead that needs to be fetched
leadId.ai_hint: ID of lead that needs to be fetched

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: binaryPropertyName
options.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

options.name: description
options.description: Text description of the Document. Limit: 255 characters.

options.name: isPrivate
options.description: Whether this record is viewable only by the owner and administrators (true) or viewable by all otherwise-allowed users (false)

options.name: name
options.description: Required. Name of the attached file. Maximum size is 255 characters. Label is File Name.

options.name: owner
options.description: ID of the User who owns the attachment. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
conditionsUi
options.description: The condition to set

values.name: field
values.description: For date, number, or boolean, please use expressions. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields to include separated by ,

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

campaignId.description: ID of the campaign that needs to be fetched. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: fieldId
values.description: The ID of the field. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.description: The value to set on custom field

binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

name.name: name
name.description: Required. Name of the attached file. Maximum size is 255 characters. Label is File Name.
name.ai_hint: Required. Name of the attached file. Maximum size is 255 characters. Label is File Name.

closeDate.name: closeDate
closeDate.description: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close.
closeDate.ai_hint: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close.

stageName.name: stageName
stageName.description: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stageName.ai_hint: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

opportunityId.name: opportunityId
opportunityId.description: ID of opportunity that needs to be fetched

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.description: ID of account that needs to be fetched
accountId.ai_hint: ID of account that needs to be fetched

query.name: query
query.description: A SOQL query. An example query parameter string might look like: “SELECT+Name+FROM+MyObject”. If the SOQL query string is invalid, a MALFORMED_QUERY response is returned.
query.ai_hint: A SOQL query. An example query parameter string might look like: “SELECT+Name+FROM+MyObject”. If the SOQL query string is invalid, a MALFORMED_QUERY response is returned.

type.name: type
type.description: The type of case. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
type.ai_hint: The type of case. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

caseId.name: caseId
caseId.description: ID of case that needs to be fetched
caseId.ai_hint: ID of case that needs to be fetched

status.name: status
status.description: The current status of the task, such as In Progress or Completed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

taskId.name: taskId

userId.name: userId
userId.description: ID of user that needs to be fetched
userId.ai_hint: ID of user that needs to be fetched

apiName.name: apiName
apiName.description: Required. API name of the flow.
apiName.ai_hint: Required. API name of the flow.

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.description: Whether the input variables should be set via the value-key pair UI or JSON/RAW

variablesUi.name: variablesUi
variablesUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'lead' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'externalId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'externalIdValue'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation IN ["create", "upsert"] THEN SHOW parameter 'company'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation IN ["create", "upsert"] THEN SHOW parameter 'lastname'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation IN ["create", "upsert"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'leadId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'leadId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'leadId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'addToCampaign' THEN SHOW parameter 'leadId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'addToCampaign' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'addToCampaign' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'addNote' THEN SHOW parameter 'leadId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'addNote' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'addNote' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'

IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'externalIdValue'

IF resource == 'contact' AND operation IN ["create", "upsert"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'

IF resource == 'customObject' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'

IF resource == 'customObject' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'customObject'
IF resource == 'customObject' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'recordId'

IF resource == 'customObject' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'customObject'

IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'

IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentId'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'

IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'flow' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'flow' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'flow' AND operation == 'invoke' THEN SHOW parameter 'apiName'
IF resource == 'flow' AND operation == 'invoke' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'flow' AND operation == 'invoke' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'variablesJson'
IF resource == 'flow' AND operation == 'invoke' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'variablesUi'
